name: The Dark Marketplace
description:
You are on your casual delivery job to the local marketplace of your town. But today something creepy happens. The doors close behind you and nothing seems to be normal. You  hear strange sounds and see figures appearing inside the Market .Will you survive?

BE SURE TO READ THE INSTRUCTIONS ON THE GAME BEFORE YOU PLAY

Bug Report / Support : https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=DQSIkWdsW0yxEjajBLZtrQAAAAAA...
